name: Elizabeth Bachman
company: Communication Training, Podcast Host, Presentation Skills

jv_history.source_quote: of the award-winning international podcast: Speakers Who Get Results, Elizabeth interviews experts from around the world on presentation skills

jv_history.partner_name: Untold Story #138: Meet Elizabeth Bachman | Elizabeth Bachman, CPS
jv_history.source_quote: Keynote Speaker \| Executive Career Coach \| Presentation Skills Trainer \| Former

what_you_do: Training and coaching for speaking, presentation skills, sales, and leadership, helping high-level professionals master their message to get results.
who_you_serve: Executive women and high-level professionals who need to make presentations but aren't getting the results they need.
social_proof: Clients include Dentsply Sirona, Gilead, Turner, Bank of America, Osborne Clarke, Plug and Play, McKesson; WBENC certified, LGBTBE certified, Dept of General Services certified, Thrive Academy certification; testimonials from UCLA Assistant Dean, CEO of How Women Lead, US Bank branch manager
signature_programs: Visible and Valued Leadership Program, Speakers Who Get Results podcast, Seeding Your Value with Stories video course, The Relationship Between Business and Art podcast
business_focus: Helping executive women and high-level professionals master speaking and presentation skills to gain visibility, influence, and recognition.
service_provided: Speaking training, presentation skills coaching, sales training, leadership development, Visible and Valued Leadership Program, video courses, podcasting
